summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3632 for the improvement of 62nd Avenue South and 63rd Avenue South, each from the south line of Fern Hill Addition to Waters Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by the construction of sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 44870, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund. .
